alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, southwestern Camden and east central Charlton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings Ferry, or 9 miles east of Folkston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Homeland, Kings Ferry and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
